snippet.title: Why Gmail and other e-mail services aren't really free
snippet.description:
* Gmail doesn't cost any money to use, but it's not free.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/31/tech/web/gmail-privacy-problems/index.html

snippet.title: A robot librarian for the social Web
snippet.description:
* There is a very simple question that Little Bird, a service that launches today in private beta, attempts to answer: What community are you interested in? With that as a starting point, the service chugs through Twitter streams, blog posts and LinkedIn pages to find the most influential people, companies and reading mater...
http://www.cnn.com/2012/10/05/tech/social-media/robot-librarian-social-web/index.html

snippet.title: How the digital blob feasts on our intimate data
snippet.description:
* There's a trillion dollar virus that is spreading throughout Silicon Valley right now. It's called social networking. This virus, a relentless kind of digital blob, feeds on our most intimate data.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/02/20/opinion/technology-data-keen/index.html

snippet.title: Silicon Valley experiencing new hiring boom
snippet.description:
* When Marty Hu graduates from Stanford University's computer science program in June, he'll enter the hottest Silicon Valley job market for software engineers since the dot.com crash a decade ago.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/TECH/innovation/04/05/silicon.valley.job.market/index.html

snippet.title: After 20-hour SWAT standoff, man suspected in cop's death found dead
snippet.description:
* A late-night 911 call. Police race to the house of a venture capitalist in an upscale suburb of Detroit. Shots are fired at officers and one of them is killed.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/09/11/us/michigan-police-killing-standoff/index.html

snippet.title: After 20-hour SWAT standoff, man suspected in cop's death found dead
snippet.description:
* A late-night 911 call. Police race to the house of a venture capitalist in an upscale suburb of Detroit. Shots are fired at officers and one of them is killed.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/09/10/us/michigan-police-killing-standoff/index.html

snippet.title: Beware, ninjas, of how you name yourself online
snippet.description:
* Today we are issuing a cease and desist to all you gurus, ninjas and evangelists out there. And we don't mean the real ones.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/TECH/social.media/04/06/annoying.names.netiquette/index.html

snippet.title: Survey finds smartphone apps store too much personal data
snippet.description:
* An uncomfortably large percentage of mobile applications are storing sensitive user account information unencrypted on owners' smartphones, according to a new survey of 100 consumer smartphone apps.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/TECH/mobile/08/09/smartphone.apps.personal.data.wired/index.html

snippet.title: How to pick the perfect name for your blog or startup
snippet.description:
* Anyone who has sat stymied with their cursor blinking in a "username" field knows that coming up with a name is harder than you'd think.
http://www.cnn.com/2010/TECH/web/05/31/perfect.name.mashable/index.html

snippet.title: 50 new tech tools you should know about
snippet.description:
* You may have dozens of apps on your phone and scores of websites bookmarked on your laptop, but that doesn't mean you have all the latest tech tools at your fingertips.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/01/25/tech/web/50-tech-tools/index.html
